sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for isolation of volatile oils using a Clevenger apparatus.
sections.scope: Applicable to volatile oil estimation in the Pharmacognosy laboratory.
procedure: Place the plant material and water in the distillation flask.
Allow distillation to proceed for the specified time.
Collect the condensed oil in the graduated arm.
Measure the volume of volatile oil obtained.
After completion, switch OFF heating and dismantle the apparatus.
sections.precautions: Avoid excessive heating. Handle glassware carefully to prevent breakage.
